summary: Implements a pipeline that integrates Stable Diffusion with GLIGEN to generate images from textual prompts (and optional layout cues), managing model initialization and loading from configuration or pretrained checkpoints.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use component for developers and businesses to embed high‑quality text‑to‑image generation into applications like content creation, advertising, design prototyping, and other creative workflows.
